title: Colors in Android x86 Emulator are wrong in version 1.68.1-rc.170
body: **Description** Colors in Android X64 Emulator are wrong **Code** Attached sample project **Expected Behavior** The same colors as with version 1.68 **Actual Behavior** After upgrading the colors are wrong in skia sharp in The android emulator on on target x64 on a real device they are correct. **Basic Information** - Version with issue: 1.68.1-rc.170 - Last known good version: 1.68 - IDE: Visual Studio 2019 16.3.9 - Platform Target Frameworks: Android X64 (In Emulator) - Android: Android Pie 9.0 - Target Devices: Android Pie 9.0 Emulator (X64) - - **Screenshots** Version 1.68 (Working) Version 1.68.1-rc.170 (Both Images did occur when changing for example the background color to White) **Reproduction Link** [App15.zip](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/files/3855715/App15.zip) I don't know if this only occours in the Emulator because I don't have a real x64 Android Device I only execute it in the Emulator on a Ryzen 1700 in the Android Emulator which has a target of x64
